citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Expired banamine (Exp 5-2022) was in storage and had been used on a goat yesterday and this morning per the animal
caretaker and licensee. Expired medications might not be effective or in some cases might not be safe to use. Ensure that
expired medications are not administered.
***Correct from 6/27/2025 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Expired banamine (Exp 5-2022) was in storage and had been used on a goat yesterday and this morning per the animal 
caretaker and licensee. Expired medications might not be effective or in some cases might not be safe to use. Ensure that 
expired medications are not administered.  
***Correct from 6/27/2025 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
